templates.name: GitHub Push
templates.description: GitHub push event triggered when commits are pushed to a repository branch or tag

templates.name: GitHub Pull Request
templates.description: GitHub pull request event triggered when a PR is opened, closed, reopened, edited, assigned, labeled, synchronized, etc.

templates.name: GitHub Issues
templates.description: GitHub issues event triggered when an issue is opened, edited, deleted, pinned, closed, reopened, assigned, labeled, etc.

templates.name: GitHub Installation
templates.description: GitHub App installation event triggered when the app is installed, uninstalled, suspended, or has permissions changed

templates.name: GitHub Installation Repositories
templates.description: GitHub App installation repositories event triggered when repositories are added to or removed from an installation

templates.name: Ragie Document Status Updated
templates.description: Ragie document status updated event triggered when a document enters indexed, keyword_indexed, ready, or failed state

templates.name: Ragie Document Deleted
templates.description: Ragie document deleted event triggered when a document is deleted

templates.name: Ragie Entity Extracted
templates.description: Ragie entity extracted event triggered when entity extraction completes for a document

templates.name: Ragie Connection Sync Started
templates.description: Ragie connection sync started event triggered when a connection sync begins

templates.name: Ragie Connection Sync Progress
templates.description: Ragie connection sync progress event triggered periodically during a sync to report progress

templates.name: Ragie Connection Sync Finished
templates.description: Ragie connection sync finished event triggered when a connection sync completes

templates.name: Ragie Connection Limit Exceeded
templates.description: Ragie connection limit exceeded event triggered when a connection exceeds its page limit

templates.name: Ragie Partition Limit Exceeded
templates.description: Ragie partition limit exceeded event triggered when a partition exceeds its document limit
